title: How to Make Miso Dressing

steps.headline: Mix the Miso and mustard together in a ceramic or glass bowl.
Add the lemon juice and water.
Add the oil slowly.
steps.description: Add some and whisk; add some more and whisk some more. Do this until all the oil is included.

steps.headline: Blend the mixture until the ingredients combine.
Add the spring onion (scallion) and minced ginger.
Whisk very gently to disperse the last ingredients.

text: Assemble the ingredients.  Mix the Miso and mustard together in a ceramic or glass bowl.  Add the lemon juice and water. Whisk together. Add the oil slowly. Add some and whisk; add some more and whisk some more. Do this until all the oil is included. Blend the mixture until the ingredients combine.  Add the spring onion (scallion) and minced ginger.  Whisk very gently to disperse the last ingredients.  Drizzle over your favourite salad.
